categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic squads

nodes.text: Squad Seven was a small group of specialists created by Advanced Recon Commando Alpha-17. It was also led by Clone Commander Cody often, although the squad was managed by Major Jorir.

The squad contained cross-trained clone commanders, pilots, marines, SCUBA troopers, demolition specialists, and snipers. The squad accompanied Jedi Generals Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker on several occasions.

During the Battle of Cato Neimoidia, the men of Squad Seven assisted Jedi General Kenobi in his assault on Trade Federation Viceroy Nute Gunray's redoubt. With their help, Kenobi was able to procure Gunray's valuable mechno-chair, which contained a holographic message from Darth Sidious to the Trade Federation Viceroy.
